creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: two panels stitched together with purple, orange, green, yellow, white, purple randa; background of stripes--red, blue, ikat red and blue; two rows of zoomorphic figures--double-headed eagle, rooster, turkey and copulating deer; three selvedges
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, jaspé (ikat), embroidery
title: Ceremonial Tzute
